metadata.title: CVE-2016-5000 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - negligible
metadata.description:
The XLSX2CSV example in Apache POI before 3.14 allows remote attackers toread arbitrary files via a crafted OpenXML document containing an externalentity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to anXML External Entity (XXE) issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5000` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-poi-java - 4.0.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1-4').
